alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Clarke; Gwinnett; Jackson; Madison; Oconee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 6:19PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Oconee, southern Barrow, east central Gwinnett, northern Clarke, southeastern Jackson and southwestern Madison Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 618 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms extended from Harbin to near Bear Creek Reservoir to Neese, and moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lawrenceville, Winder, Athens, Dacula, Grayson, Statham, Comer, Bogart, Bethlehem, Colbert, Hull, Athens-Clarke County, Westgate Park, James Holland Youth Sports Cmpx, Bear Creek Reservoir, Fort Yargo State Park, Diamond Hill, Sandy Creek Recreation Area, Oconee Heights and Harbin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Barrow; Clarke; Gwinnett; Jackson; Madison; Oconee
